meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Sarah von Riedemann Beth Masterson Hunter Appler Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7323.

td.p: Sarah von Riedemann, a medical writer from Toronto, Ontario, Canada
Beth Masterson, a correctional librarian from Lincolnton, North Carolina
Hunter Appler, an attorney originally from Mount Airy, North Carolina (whose 5-day cash winnings total $129,002)

tr.td: WASHINGTON STATE SYMBOLS
BESTSELLING BOOKS
NON-TRADITIONAL ACTORS
AROUND THE WORLD
ADD TO "ADS"
HIGHLAND BLING

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Washington is the USA\'s leading grower of these, the state\'s official fruit')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Washington is the USA's leading grower of these, the state's official fruit

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: I think our Final Jeopardy! clues are getting to be too easy. Once again, all three players wrote down their responses immediately. )
...
(Alex: [To Beth] Alfred Hitchcock\'s famous film.)
BethWhat is Psycho?
$1,300
SarahWhat is Psycho?
$8,300
HunterWhat is Psycho?
$6,601
Psycho')

Hunter
Beth
Sarah

3rd place: $1,000
2nd place: $2,000
Hunter
Beth
Sarah

9 W
(including 1 DD)

3 W
(including 2 DDs)

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
